price: E ele desejou expulsá-los da terra então, afogamo-lo e a quem estava com ele, a todos.
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-arāda an yastafizzahum mina al-arḍi fa-aghraqnāhu waman maʿahu jamīʿan
